TopicTitle: My version of the Soyuz rocket and capsule

Articles.Content:
This is My version of the Soyuz rocket and the Soyuz capsule

I used the novapunch pack the the Soyuz rocket and kept it as close to the actual soyuz as possible, I used the radial boosters the add stability and to also drain the out tanks more quickly, after they seperate the inner 2 tanks and adapters are just enough to get the craft into a 75k circular orbit.

The capsule itself is made with the stock 1 man capsule, I used a decoupler (from the other Soyuz mod XD) to attach to the stock tank, the stock tank is used to take the craft from a 75k orbit to a 400k orbit and back again, on the tank are 2 huge solar panels and 4 RCS tanks (from the Kosmos pack)

The craft is very capable of making multiple trips between 75k and 400k orbits (yet to test whether or not it can do a 1,000,000m orbit....I doubt it though)

So, what do you guys think? did I keep in style of the original Soyuz? and should I make changes or add different aesthetics? (radar dish? antenna?)

(Also, how do I get the photos to appear in the post and not as attachments, I'm still getting used to the new forum)
